########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND dump1090_sources
    mode_s_decoder_impl.cc
    mode_ac_decoder_impl.cc
    iq_converter_impl.cc
    crc_validator_impl.cc
    demod_ask_impl.cc
)

set(dump1090_sources "${dump1090_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT dump1090_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT dump1090_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-dump1090 SHARED ${dump1090_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-dump1090 ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-dump1090 PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_dump1090_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-dump1090 PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-dump1090)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_dump1090_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-dump1090)

if(NOT test_dump1090_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_dump1090_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_dump1090_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("dump1090_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)

    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_mode_s_decoder.cc    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_mode_ac_decoder.cc    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_iq_converter.cc    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_crc_validator.cc    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_demod_ask.cc
